sec.p:
Air pollutant emissions, historical and projected, were obtained using emission factors data multiplied by activity data for each sectoral flow, endogenously produced by POLES-JRC. This was done for 35 sectoral flows (sectoral and fuel-specific energy demand, industrial activity, population) for each of the 6 pollutants (SO 2, NO
x , CO, BC, organic carbon, non-methane volatile organic compounds). The emission factors were derived from the GAINS model
73 , using information from the ECLIPSE exercise
74 .
